https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/59DY0zp9Ab7GBxT6v5aFe8mgPgl.jpg Violet is a vampire with a taste for both men and women. One of her targets is a young man, named Chuck, whom she picks up in a bar, wines him, frightens him and eventually excites him into her bed. Date with a Vampire
